name: BullorBear
0:
”Alexa open bull or bear”
”I'm feeling bullish on bitcoin”
”I'm feeling bearish on ethereum”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bull or bear
des:
Get LIVE Bull/Bear sentiments on leading cryptocurrencies and assets.

You: "I'm feeling bullish on bitcoin"
Alexa: "The bull bear ratio is 82%. Meaning 82% of users are bullish, and 18% of users are bearish on this asset."


This skill is meant for educational/informational purposes only and is not to be taken as financial advice.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
